com.swoval.files

Class Executor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.swoval.files.Executor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public abstract class Executor
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Provides an execution context to run tasks. Exists to allow source interoperability with scala.js

      • copy

        public Executor copy()
        Returns a copy of the executor. The purpose of this is to provide the executor to a class or method without allowing the class or method to close the underlying executor.
        Returns:
        An executor that

      • block

        public <T> Either<java.lang.Exception,T> block(java.util.concurrent.Callable<T> callable)
        Blocks the current thread until the executor runs the Callable and returns the value.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The result type of the Callable
        Parameters:
        callable - The callable whose value we're waiting on.
        Returns:
        The result evaluated by the Callable

      • block

        public boolean block(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
        Blocks the current thread until the executor runs the provided Runnable.
        Parameters:
        runnable - The Runnable to invoke.
        Returns:
        true if the Runnable succeeds, false otherwise.

      • close

        public void close()
        Close the executor. All exceptions must be handled by the implementation.
        Specified by:
